name: Bryan Apostol
text: If you like reading science fiction, usually you are the kind that is willing, even looking forward to, being swept  awayby basic premises of the "improbable" as being "reality" (and then taken to the logical extreme). So i think typically it will not be as difficult to imagine relatively utopian scenarios that realists would scoff at.
